name: Bar Night
description: Perfect for a casual night out with friends at the bar

prompts.text: %s, drink if you've been to this bar before
Everyone wearing jeans, take a sip
%s, guess the bartender's name. If you're right, give out 3 sips. If wrong, drink 2
%s and %s, rock-paper-scissors. Loser drinks 2
Last person to raise their hand drinks 3
%s, what's your go-to drink order? Everyone who's had the same, drink together
If you drove here tonight, give out 3 sips (and thank you for being responsible)
%s, drink once for every app you have on your home screen
'Beer brands', first person to repeat or hesitate drinks 3. %s, you start
Everyone check your phone. Whoever has the most unread texts drinks 2
%s, thumb war with %s. Loser finishes their drink
If you've texted an ex this month, drink 3
'Cocktail names', keep going until someone repeats or blanks. %s starts
%s, show your most recent photo. Group votes: if it's boring, drink 2
Anyone who checked their phone in the last 5 minutes, drink 2
%s, how many songs are in your most played playlist? Drink that many sips (max 5)
Last person to touch the table finishes their drink
If you're the oldest at the table, give out 4 sips
If you're the youngest at the table, drink 2
'Countries you've visited', first to hesitate or repeat drinks 2. %s, go
%s, who would win in a fight: you or %s? The group decides. Loser drinks 3
Everyone point at who you think is most likely to fall asleep first tonight. That person drinks
%s, do your best celebrity impression. If no one guesses it, drink 3
If you know everyone's middle name at this table, give out 5 sips
Categories: TV shows that got cancelled too soon. First to repeat or hesitate drinks 2
%s, without looking, guess what time it is. Within 10 minutes? Give out 2. Otherwise drink 2
If you've ever been kicked out of a bar, drink 3 and tell the story
%s is the Question Master. Anyone who answers your questions directly must drink
prompts.secondary: %s is no longer the Question Master

prompts.text: %s, guess %s's phone battery percentage within 10%. Right? They drink 3. Wrong? You drink 2
Everyone with their phone face-up on the table, drink 1
'Things you'd find in this bar', no repeats, no hesitation. %s starts
%s, tell us your most embarrassing drunk story or drink 4
If you've ever blacked out, drink 2
%s and %s, staring contest. First to blink drinks 2
Cheers to the group! Everyone drinks 1
'Famous duos', keep naming pairs. First to repeat or hesitate drinks 3. %s, go
%s, scroll to a random contact in your phone. You have to text them 'hey' or drink 3
If you've already planned what you're eating after this, drink 2
%s, give a toast to the group. If it's weak, the group makes you drink 3
%s, you can only speak in questions until told otherwise
If this isn't your first drink tonight, take a sip
%s, pick someone to be your drinking buddy. %s, you both drink 2 together
On 3, everyone point to who you think will be drunkest by the end of the night. Most votes drinks 3
%s, name 3 songs by the artist currently playing. Can't? Drink 3
If you're wearing a watch, give out 2 sips
'80s or 90s movies', no repeats. %s, you start
%s, make up a nickname for someone at the table. If they accept it, they drink 2
The next person whose phone buzzes has to drink 3
%s, how long have you known %s? Drink one for each year (max 5)
If you've been here for more than 2 hours, finish your drink
Everyone guess how much the tab is so far. Closest gives out 4, furthest drinks 4
'Things you shouldn't say on a first date', keep going until someone hesitates. %s, start
%s, rate everyone's outfit tonight 1-10. Anyone under 7 drinks
If you've ever worked in a bar or restaurant, give out 3
No one can say the word 'drink' until further notice. Say it and you drink 2
%s, show your screen time from this week. Over 4 hours daily average? Drink 3
%s and %s, whoever has fewer Instagram followers drinks 2
'Types of shots', no repeats. %s, go
If you could leave right now without consequences, would you? Be honest. If yes, drink 2
%s, balance a coaster on your head for 10 seconds or drink 2
Anyone wearing black, drink 1
On 3, everyone vote: is this bar a 'first date' spot or a 'friends only' spot? Minority drinks 2
%s, give out sips equal to the number of people in your group chat with the most messages
If you've Ubered here, drink 1. If you're Ubering home, drink 2
%s, you and %s have to compliment each other. Whoever gives the weaker compliment drinks 2
'Things your mom would be disappointed about', keep going. %s, start
Everyone close your eyes. If you think you'll be hungover tomorrow, raise your hand. Those with hands up, drink 2
%s, what's your credit card bill looking like this month? Over $500? Drink 3
%s, you have to high-five someone every time you take a sip
If you've already ordered food tonight, give out 2
Flip cup challenge! %s vs the person across from you. Loser finishes their drink
Whoever has cash on them right now, give out 3
%s, what's the last thing you Googled? If it's embarrassing, drink 3
'One-hit wonders', name songs or artists. First to hesitate drinks 2. %s, go
If you've said 'I'm not drinking that much tonight' earlier, drink 3
%s and %s, play 'odds are' for 2 sips. Pick a number 1-10, if you match, both drink
If you've been on your phone for anything other than this game, drink 2
%s, your next drink is chosen by the group. Accept it or drink your current one fast
Everyone say a number 1-5 on 3. Anyone who matches someone else drinks 1
Last person to have eaten today drinks 2
%s, say something you like about each person at the table. Skip anyone? Drink 2 per skip
%s, you must touch your nose before drinking every time
prompts.secondary: %s, you can drink like a normal person again

prompts.text: Raise your hand if you've been to a better bar this week. Those with hands up, drink 1
%s, arm wrestle %s. Loser drinks 3. Chicken out and drink 4
Round of appreciation! Everyone says one nice thing about the person to their left, then we all drink 1
Last person to put their thumb on the table finishes their drink
'Things you'd never admit to your parents', keep going. %s, start
If you're having a good time, drink 1. If you're having a GREAT time, drink 2
%s, rank everyone's dance moves 1-10. Under 5 drinks
To good friends! Everyone clinks glasses and takes a sip
%s, how many drinks have you had tonight? Drink 1 more for honesty
Never have I ever... go around the table. If you've done it, drink 1
If you're having the best night of your week right now, give out 3
Group selfie! Whoever's eyes are closed in the photo drinks 3
%s, venmo someone at the table $1 or drink 4
If tomorrow's a work day, drink 2 for courage
Cheers to the night! Everyone finishes what's in their glass
